lenders.name: Sombra
lenders.loan_because: I'm pretty lucky, I have enough to live and I would like to help other people to live happier and with a better future

lenders.name: Raul
lenders.loan_because: They need it more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: Educator

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help others around the world, by investing in people's business, so they can have an oppertunity to make a living and increase their income:)
Why not make the world better trough KIVA?
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: catherina
lenders.loan_because: I think lending out money this way is the best way to be able to help people make a future for themselves. I also like the connection to the people I help by following their progress, and I like to see that it actually works! I tryed one loan to start with. Now that I see it works, I decided to put in 4 more loans around the world. I will keep doing so as i think Kiva is doing wonderful work here ! :-)

lenders.name: Knut
lenders.loan_because: It is my way of making the world a littlebit better place to live. How often do we spend money for things that we realy don't need, and put it away after a short time? I feel I get a lot more "interest" of lending money to people that realy need the money than spend it on worthless things. Kiva gives me the opportunity to help people around the world. For me is this a "penny" issue, but it can make such a huge difference in another's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Working at the Norwegian Public Roads Administration

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I can!  I love the concept that people all around the world can get together an loan to others to make them successful.   I especially like the opportunity to empower women who have established their own businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: As a software project manager, I am responsible for ensuring that our products are shipped on time, are of high quality and that I can report anything that prevents a high-quality, on-time release to our executives.

lenders.name: Trond & Bente
lenders.loan_because: I hope to give someone who is in need a chance in life.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I like helping fellow entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a book publishing business.

lenders.name: Joanie
lenders.loan_because: I just spent 3 weeks in Africa helping in a small village in Malawi  and realized how much a loan could help in their  village.   I will be recommending this site to them as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I counsel people when they have emotional problems....loss, conflict, heartache.

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Pelin
lenders.loan_because: I feel that we are a community in the whole world and borders do not count...

lenders.name: Nightengale
lenders.loan_because: I believe this organization can get the funds directly to the individuals in need.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: even the smallest amount of money can make a difference. And instead of letting my money rot on a bank account, why shouldn't I just loan it to people who need it? Excactly.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently attending a german college and pursuing a Bachelors degree in telecommunications & computer science. At the same time I work for the Deutsche Telekom, which funds the college. So it combines work and study.

lenders.name: Hector
lenders.loan_because: To help them to reach their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I have two jobs, one is a supervisor for a transformer company the other with my wife we own a roofing company.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: I have a lot to be grateful for and an obligation to share.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to have everything I need to survive.  I want to share some of my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: TIMOTHY
lenders.loan_because: I run a snail farm and need to enlarge and be able to export it and also need to run a big cafe and bar together .
lenders.occupational_info: Exciting

lenders.name: Jessica & Tony
lenders.loan_because: it is important to give to people and help their dreams come true. It is also important for underdeveloped countries to prosper and grow their economies.

lenders.name: Nava
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Gretchen & Ray
lenders.loan_because: We've been blessed with more than we need and want to share with others in a way that really empowers them to make better lives for themselves and their communities.

lenders.name: allan
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by people who are striving to make a better life for their families and others by building their own businesses. I know this takes hard work, dedication and money. To be able to contribute to their enterprises is a privilege I take great pride in.
lenders.occupational_info: We provide imaging services to Ad Agencies, designers, printers and others in the graphic arts community.

lenders.name: Jarle
lenders.loan_because:
I`d like to help others 
- and this really works!

If you have the opportunity to spend some money to help someone, don`t just think about it - DO IT!!

lenders.name: Eleonore
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I believe we all benefit when we promote and seek equal or better opportunities for all, including under-served populations
lenders.occupational_info: I direct compelling films, sometimes fictional, sometimes pieces of true narratives from around the globe that move and inspire action.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: It gives an opportunity to someone to become self sustaining and possibly pay the loan forward to someone they know who needs financial support.
lenders.occupational_info: fund raiser for juvenile diabetes

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: When I heard about this I thought it was such an amazing idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for 2 major retail accounts in Canada where I manage the day to day business of having our products sold within their organization.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: It just makes good sense.

lenders.name: Madeline
lenders.loan_because: My microeconomics teacher in high school decided that our class should lend money for a microloan. After the course, I decided to continue by lending my own money. This organization makes me feel connected with the recipients of the loans. It's good to put a face to the name.
lenders.occupational_info: Starting in September of 2009, I will be an undergraduate student at a university in the United States.

lenders.name: Emely
lenders.loan_because:
I want to make the world a better place and help people.

Thank you for giving me this opportunity to share wealth responsibly. I wish you, your families and your communities the best.

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that puts websites on the internet. My husband and I also belong to a Christian Ministry called Gospel Outreach NW that ministers to the motorcycle world.

lenders.name: D-J
lenders.loan_because: Giving is as natural as receiving.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a building that is a sacred space where people can go within through meditation and chanting.

lenders.loan_because: liberal guilt.
lenders.occupational_info: I do mostly what they pay me for, which is sometimes related to information security and systems analysis.

lenders.occupational_info: Desk jockey by day; abstract painter and cat mom by night.

lenders.occupational_info: We are a comedy room in Sydney Australia, run every week by comics.

lenders.name: El and Bill

lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher of 6 year old children and loved working with the young ones.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital and take xrays of people who are hurt as a profession, but I enjoy being around good, giving people in all areas of my life.

lenders.name: Denise and Mike
lenders.loan_because: Money is energy and it's fun to watch it work.

lenders.name: Matthew & Corrie
lenders.loan_because: We believe in microfinance
lenders.occupational_info: Studying in order to better serve others. Sisi ni mwanafunzi.

lenders.name: Team 4
lenders.loan_because: We want to give people an opportunity to improve their current situation. We hope that our loan will help expand the global economy and provide more job opportunities in the area in which we loan.
lenders.occupational_info: We are four business students at Regis University, taking an International Finance course. In this course we are covering material including the growing trend of microlending and other aspects  of foreign exchange markets. As part of this class we have been given the opportunity to lend to two entrepreneurs through Kiva to gain first hand experience with micro loans.

lenders.name: Dizzydog
lenders.loan_because:
Want something good to happen? 
Do something good.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm an executive recruiter working with organisations looking to source middle to senior level staff in the Asia Pacific Region

lenders.name: Blain
lenders.loan_because: Everything is interconnected, so I think I'll help myself.

lenders.name: Joanna

lenders.name: Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: I care about people worldwide, but have a special connection to Bolivia, South America.  We lived for some years in Bolivia and made several very good friends.  Also, our dog, Whiskey, was born in El Alto, Bolivia and now resides with us in Colorado.

lenders.name: Amy's mom

lenders.name: simonidossos
lenders.loan_because:
I want to see how kiva actually works. 

I am more then sceptical that there is any future in lending money in this fashion and am afraid, that the lack of sustainability will one day not only leave some westerners without their "investments", but rather the microfinance sector in the third world still underdeveloped. 

Microfinance as microcredit without microsaving is never a good idea. Please make sure you check on your MFIs's mixmarket profile. If they have no savers, don't fund them. They use your interest free money to destroy a local and sustainable solution.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting dreams and goals.  I would not be who I am without my family and friends, and I have the chance to give back to the world what they have given to me.

lenders.name: Roma
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: visual interpretations

lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a good life.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to help make a difference in the lives of people willing to put in hard work to get ahead in life.

lenders.name: anne
lenders.loan_because: When I started my business I was very lucky - I had the capital needed. It's tough and very hard work to start and build a business - if you don't have the capital, then that's another head ache. Think this is a great way to help take away one of the challenges of being an entrepreneur. Hope the lending limit is removed soon.
lenders.occupational_info: My company does what is called business communication. This means we make marketing brochures, advertisements, financial reports and other communication, such as websites, for our clients so they can send or give them to interested people, like shareholders.

lenders.name: Jonas

lenders.name: Vil Marie
lenders.loan_because: Every body needs help and if I can give them help then that gives me hope that I might get one step closer to filling my dream of becoming an enterprenauer.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and write code for internet web pages.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It's a fantastic and easy way to really help someone with her or his business

lenders.name: Renee Beneteau
lenders.loan_because: giving is contagious ...
lenders.occupational_info: A CFRE with 20+ years of innovating for good.

lenders.name: Ivo
lenders.loan_because: it's the best way of helping .

lenders.name: Jean-Louis
lenders.loan_because: In spite of the fact that my overall income, having a heart disease, is not enough to live, and to much to die (western standards), there's always some money left to be able to get someone else in drive- position.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in park- position because of a heart disease. Employers just squeezed the last bit of energy out of me, had to be in kick-down position always so I ran dry on oil and I got kicked out. That's the way 'developed' countries like the Netherlands treat their working force.

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it is my feeling that we are all one, walking the same path towards the same goal. It's our love and support for one another that makes it possible to endure. Helping people to succeed is the path to being successful yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Business people how to speak business English so that they can succeed in their jobs. My students are all foreign, and native Dutch, adults learning English as a second language. Being that I'm an American living in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, I interact with people from all over the world, and it's a wonderful experience to live and teach abroad.

Good initiative and we love Africa.
we visit it as often as we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Buiding supervisor now retired,My wife is still working on a school as aministrationworker.

lenders.name: Cuauhtemoc
lenders.loan_because: Soy una persona discapacitada y no encuentro empleo asi que tengo un pequeño taller en mi casa donde fabrico zapatillas de ballet,sin embargo no tengo la maquinaria suficiente para esto necesito 1,200 dolares para comprar maquinaria y equipo y armar mi taller de fabricacion de zapatillas de ballet
lenders.occupational_info: Hago zapatillas de ballet, para bailarinas, estudiantes y artistas de ballet de fama internacional, tengo experiencia de mas de 10 años

lenders.name: Ragnhild
lenders.loan_because:
- I think the world in general is unbearably unfair, but microfinance is a fair way to do a little bit of something about it. Every little action counts. 
- I run my own little one-woman-business and feel somewhat related to the kiva-entrepreneurs.
- When the nations of my part of the world still are exploiting others by claiming their legitime or illegitime loans repaid with interest, then the least I can do is to make a couple of interest-free loans myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I do editing, proofreading and translations mainly for publishing houses, and also give private Norwegian lessons to immigrants.

lenders.loan_because: for the first time I feel I can help somebody developing their business or caring for their family and I actually know where my money goes to.

lenders.name: Linda

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: When you help a man, or a woman, a family or a community, it benefits the entire world.  We are providing the tools for these borrowers to realize their own dreams through their own visions, capabilities and hard work.  By helping them change their world one dream at a time our world is also changed.  We share their success through the harmony brought by empowerment and that increased harmony affects families, communities and even countries.  My hope is that this activity will help the world will become a kinder and gentler place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the recording of the financial information of our Company.  This information must be presented so management  will understand the results of past operations and be able to make appropriate future decisions regarding how to utilize the resources of our Company most effectively.  I am also responsible for the collection of amounts due to our Company and for the correct and timely payment of our bills.

lenders.name: Katelyn
lenders.loan_because: This loan is being offered on behalf of my daughter.  In the past she has done great things for people in need.  While in middle school, she raised money to send holiday gifts to children in impoverished countries.  She raised money in high school to purchase all the apartment needs for a refuge' family who was being etablished in our area.  She worked with her religious group in high school to spend time in the summer helping in needy areas around us.  She spent time doing missionary work in Ecuador the summer after senior year of high school.  She is an inspiration, showing what one person can do to help!  I hope to continue her good work and ideas in supporting the KIVA program in her name.
